	public void add() {
		//Cat_test test=new Cat_test(); // Hier arbeite mit Catagory Objekt;
		//test.setName(txtName.getText());
		
		String sql ="INSERT INTO category(name) VALUES (?)";
		PreparedStatement pstmt;
		try {
			String name=txtName.getText();
			pstmt = con.prepareStatement(sql);
			pstmt.setString(1,name);
			JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"Category wurde hinzugefügt","Add Category", JOptionPane.PLAIN_MESSAGE);
			
			pstmt.execute();
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		txtName.setText("");
		
	}
	

	@Override
	public void delete(int id) {
		String sql="DELETE FROM category WHERE id=?";
		PreparedStatement pstmt;
		try {
			pstmt=con.prepareStatement(sql);
			pstmt.setInt(1, id);
			JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"Category wurde gelöscht","Add Category", JOptionPane.PLAIN_MESSAGE);
			
			pstmt.execute();
		}
		catch (SQLException e) {
			
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		txtName.setText("");
		txtId.setText("");
		
	}

	@Override
	public void update(int id) {
		
		String sql="UPDATE category SET name=? WHERE id=?";
		PreparedStatement pstmt;
		try {
			pstmt=con.prepareStatement(sql);
			pstmt.setString(1, txtName.getText());
			pstmt.setInt(2, id);
			
			JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"Category wurde upzudat","Update Category", JOptionPane.PLAIN_MESSAGE);
			
			pstmt.execute();
			
		}catch(SQLException e) {
			
			e.printStackTrace();
			
		}
		txtName.setText("");
		txtId.setText("");
		
	}
